title: Easy potato and pea samosas
description: An easy little vegetable samosa that makes a delicious, inexpensive lunch from storecupboard ingredients.
ingredients: 1-2 tsp dried mango powder, to taste (alternatively, use juice of 1/2 a lemon)
600g/1lb 5oz potatoes, peeled, boiled until soft and crushed into large lumps
2 tbsp sesame seeds (optional) (you can also use poppy or nigella seeds)
